episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Indigenous Lands & Innovation
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Indigenous Lands & Innovation.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down [GN Clean Energy and EVs] India speeds clean energy shift, narrows gap with China and [NYT Top Stories] This Comet Stopped Spinning. Then It Started Rotating Backward., plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into indigenous lands & innovation, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
